summary: The diff implements robust frontend-side product ID/price normalization and correct ID conversion for update/delete calls via new/updated mapping helpers and changes in the products CRUD hook. It also modifies two meta/documentation/state summary files not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata tracking of feature requests and status (project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to fix the frontend product ID mismatch and CRUD typing; it does not request adding/updating project tracking files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated a frontend file summary/documentation artifact (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request generating or modifying summary documentation files; only functional code changes were requested.
